title: RP gifting
body: Riot I`m sorry for the question but i need 16 rp for getting an augmented cache i need so much. I `ve heard that you can give to 40 rp in need si i decided to give it a shot. i hope you wouldn`t ban my acc if you get this post as an offensive one

replies.body: Rineyy's response is spot on, and we'd like to help!  As suggested, please reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see what we can do.  Looking forward to hearing from you!

Firstly, you wouldn't be banned for requesting RP.

---

Secondly;

Contact Riot’s [Player Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category has already been selected. 


* For the secondary category, choose **Game & Features.**


* Under the tertiary category, choose **General Questions.**


http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Blitzcrank_5.jpg

You can also tweet your request to [@RiotSupport.](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport) Try to include some self-created art if you do!

*Credits to Deep Terror Nami for enlightening me on [@RiotSupport.](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport)*
